title: Cyber Fraud Ring - Elder Victims
description: Organized phone scam operation targeting elderly residents. Victims tricked into providing bank details. Over $500k stolen across 23 victims.

persons.name: Margaret Thompson
persons.statement: They said they were from the IRS. I gave them my Social Security number and bank account. They took $45,000.

persons.name: Robert Williams
persons.statement: The caller had an American accent. Said my grandson was in jail and needed bail money.

persons.name: James Miller
persons.statement: They called multiple times over a week. Very convincing. Lost my entire retirement savings.

persons.name: Unknown Caller 1
persons.description: Male voice, American accent, claimed to be IRS agent 'Michael Johnson'

persons.name: Unknown Caller 2
persons.description: Female voice, claimed to be bank representative

evidence.description: Recorded phone call from victim Thompson
Bank transaction records showing wire transfers
Phone number trace report - VoIP service
